description:
Designed for days that start on the trail and end on the patio. Like you, the Seapine shirt is at home on the trail or at a backyard BBQ.

  • Soft organic cotton blend wears well, feels cool against your skin, and wicks away moisture
  • Single chest pocket is ready for your sunnies and some cash
  • Dropped hem offers a bit more coverage and can even handle a tuck
  • UPF 30 blocks more than 95% of harsh UV
  • Trim fit for that clean, tailored look
name: Outdoor Research Seapine Short Sleeve Shirt - Men's
